name: User Login Authentication
description: As a user, I want to login to the application so that I can access my dashboard

background.text: I am on the login page

scenarios.name: Successful login with valid email and password

steps.text: I am a registered user with email "user@example.com" and password "Password123"
I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
I enter "Password123" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see the dashboard page
I should see a welcome message
I am a registered user
I enter "invalid@example.com" in the email field
I enter "Password123" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see an error message
I should remain on the login page
the error message should contain "Invalid credentials"
I am a registered user with email "user@example.com"
I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
I enter "WrongPassword" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see an error message
I should remain on the login page
the error message should contain "Invalid credentials"

scenarios.name: Login fails with empty email field

steps.text: I am on the login page
I leave the email field empty
I enter "Password123" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see a validation error message
the email field should be highlighted as invalid
I should remain on the login page

scenarios.name: Login fails with empty password field

steps.text: I am on the login page
I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
I leave the password field empty
I click the login button
I should see a validation error message
the password field should be highlighted as invalid
I should remain on the login page

scenarios.name: Login fails with both fields empty

steps.text: I am on the login page
I leave the email field empty
I leave the password field empty
I click the login button
I should see validation error messages for both fields
both email and password fields should be highlighted as invalid
I should remain on the login page
I am on the login page
I enter "invalid-email-format" in the email field
I enter "Password123" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see an email format validation error
the email field should be highlighted as invalid
I should remain on the login page
I am on the login page
I enter "Password123" in the password field
the password field should display masked characters
the actual password text should not be visible

scenarios.name: Login button is disabled until both fields are filled

steps.text: I am on the login page
the login button should be disabled
I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
the login button should still be disabled
I enter "Password123" in the password field
the login button should be enabled

gherkin_content:
Feature: User Login Authentication
  As a user, I want to login to the application so that I can access my dashboard

  Background:
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am on the login page
    StepKeyword.AND the login form is displayed

  @smoke @happy-path @login
  Scenario: Successful login with valid email and password
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am a registered user with email "user@example.com" and password "Password123"
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "Password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see the dashboard page
    StepKeyword.AND I should see a welcome message

  @negative @login @error-handling
  Scenario: Login fails with invalid email
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am a registered user
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "invalid@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "Password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page
    StepKeyword.AND the error message should contain "Invalid credentials"

  @negative @login @error-handling
  Scenario: Login fails with invalid password
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am a registered user with email "user@example.com"
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "WrongPassword" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page
    StepKeyword.AND the error message should contain "Invalid credentials"

  @negative @ui @validation
  Scenario: Login fails with empty email field
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am on the login page
    StepKeyword.WHEN I leave the email field empty
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "Password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see a validation error message
    StepKeyword.AND the email field should be highlighted as invalid
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @ui @validation
  Scenario: Login fails with empty password field
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am on the login page
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I leave the password field empty
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see a validation error message
    StepKeyword.AND the password field should be highlighted as invalid
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @edge-case @validation
  Scenario: Login fails with both fields empty
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am on the login page
    StepKeyword.WHEN I leave the email field empty
    StepKeyword.AND I leave the password field empty
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see validation error messages for both fields
    StepKeyword.AND both email and password fields should be highlighted as invalid
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @edge-case @validation
  Scenario: Login with invalid email format
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am on the login page
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "invalid-email-format" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "Password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an email format validation error
    StepKeyword.AND the email field should be highlighted as invalid
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @ui @security
  Scenario: Password field masks input characters
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am on the login page
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "Password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.THEN the password field should display masked characters
    StepKeyword.AND the actual password text should not be visible

  @ui @edge-case
  Scenario: Login button is disabled until both fields are filled
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am on the login page
    StepKeyword.THEN the login button should be disabled
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.THEN the login button should still be disabled
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "Password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.THEN the login button should be enabled
